tool_description: Verifies insurance coverage and formulary status for prescribed medications and identifies coverage tiers and restrictions.

drug_name.description: Name of the medication to check

check_alternatives.description: Whether to suggest formulary alternatives if not covered

error_messages: Invalid insurance ID: The provided insurance plan identifier is not recognized.
Drug not found: The specified medication is not in the database.
Invalid quantity: Quantity must be between 1-1000.
Formulary database unavailable: Cannot access insurance formulary information.
Coverage verification failed: Unable to verify coverage status for this drug-insurance combination.
usage: Provide patient_insurance_id and drug_name to check formulary status. Optionally specify drug_strength, quantity, and whether to check alternatives.

is_covered.description: Whether the medication is covered by insurance
